headline: Ask HN: Did you noticed a more aggressive ad campaign for Facebook on the web?
description: I haven't interacted anything to do with Meta as except to reading articles about the stock crash, but it seems that both for me and my circle of friends we noticed that Facebook (as a platform) has apparently launched a new (at least by the looks of it) video ad, in addition to increase in banner ads. Is Facebook/Meta beginning to get desperate that they launched new ad campaigns or is it just isolated to us?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你是否注意到Facebook在网络上进行了更积极的广告宣传？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你是否注意到Facebook在網絡上進行了更積極的廣告宣傳？
description_zh-Hans: 除了阅读有关股灾的文章外，我没有与Meta互动，但似乎我和我的朋友圈都注意到Facebook（作为一个平台）除了增加横幅广告外，显然还推出了新的（至少看起来是这样）视频广告。是Facebook/Meta开始绝望了，他们推出了新的广告活动，还是只是孤立于我们？
description_zh-Hant: 除了閱讀有關股災的文章外，我沒有與Meta互動，但似乎我和我的朋友圈都注意到Facebook（作為一個平臺）除了增加橫幅廣告外，顯然還推出了新的（至少看起來是這樣）視頻廣告。是Facebook/Meta開始絕望了，他們推出了新的廣告活動，還是隻是孤立於我們？
